channel.title: Taiko on Koh Yamakawa
channel.description: Recent content in Taiko on Koh Yamakawa

item.title: Starting a Taiko site
item.description: Under inspiration from the superb personal site of Kris Bergstrom, I’ll start curating my first personal site on Taiko. I don’t aim really to give any instruction or information to any students but I might post some useful links and thoughts that I’ve had on my Taiko journey! Documenting and publishing, albeit to an audience of measure zero, is a process that I want to immerse myself in both so that I can look back on my own progress in the future and maybe even organize my thoughts.
